scripts.transform: yarn token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/global.json global --resolveReferences=false && yarn token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/webapp.json global,webapp global --resolveReferences=false && yarn token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/webapp-components.json global,webapp,webapp-components global,webapp --resolveReferences=false
scripts.build: yarn transform && node scripts/sd-build.js && yarn rollup -c
